forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: allow friends to set their home as your area.

comments.text: multiple owners of an area basically
you could sort of do that if you made the spawnpoint of your area send you to the desired area.
